parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the Senate for Victoria 2010 (term began 1.7.2011).

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: Senate Standing: Finance and Public Administration: Legislation and References Committees from 5.7.11 to 11.11.13.
Senate Select: Abbott Government's Commission of Audit from 12.12.13 to 19.6.14; Abbott Government's Budget Cuts from 7.7.14 to 3.12.14 (Chair from11.12.13); Health from 7.7.14.

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Leader of the Australian Greens from 6.5.15.

Australian Greens portfolios: Health (including Preventive), Dental Health, Sport, Gambling, Multiculturalism, East Timor and West Papua from 1.7.11 to 11.11.13; Health, Dental Health, Sport, Gambling and Multiculturalism from 11.11.13 to 1.7.14; Health, Multiculturalism and Sport from 1.7.14 to 25.5.15; Prime Minister and Cabinet, Health, Sport and Multiculturalism from 25.5.15.

party.positions.title: Party Positions
party.positions.para: Founding member, Melbourne and Moreland Branches, Victorian Greens.
National Councillor, State Councillor and Regional Councillor, Australian Greens.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: Fellow, Australasian Faculty of Public Health Medicine.
Fellow, Australasian College of Rural and Remote Medicine.
Public health registrar, Dept of Human Services 2002-05.
International Public Health, Nossal Institute for Global Health, Melbourne University 2005-07.
